name: IO Solutions
description:
IOS Center is an organization specialized in the telecommunications field. More precisely, it’s a call center in full expansion that offers quality services to its clientele. IOS Center Inc. is a business process outsourcer with a worldwide reach. We offer inbound, outbound and back office services out of four locations on three continents: PEI (Canada), Montréal (Canada), Philippines (English) and Morocco (French).
With our focus on contact centers and back office environments, we have acquired a diversified portfolio of clients in the telecom, media, banking, energy, software, and financial services fields. IOS Center is not only a great place to work but also a wonderful place to evolve. The diversity makes the IOS team unique and contributes in setting us apart from the competition. Our team members include people like you - enthusiastic, innovative, passionate and energetic. We believe that you’ll find your place in our high-performance environment.
READ MORE...
